page.title: 04Houses in Sawbridgeworth
page.content: Many of the old houses in {Sawbridgeworth}have been knocked down. Some have survived, and there is a mixture of buildings.An example of a medieval house is the{Market House. } It was lived in until recently but has now been made into a restaurant. This has not changed the outside in any way. Some Queen Anne houses were destroyed to make a new road but many Georgian houses are left.Many Victorian houses are now shops, changed inside but still with a rather dull brick aspect outside. There are many pre second world war houses. In the last 20 years many new houses,on estates,have been built and people from all over England have come to Sawbridgeworth to live.These houses are rather small,light inside and many are of open plan design.The mixture of styles makes Sawbridgeworth attractive
